languages.text: "Жаль, что я не настоящий комиссар, иначе непременно тебя послушал бы! Не, мы остаемся, Император не любит трусов. Если тебе так будет легче, считай, что это я тебя так обманул напоследок, по старой памяти. Такой уж я негодяй".

traits.locale_text: "Жаль, что я не настоящий комиссар, иначе непременно тебя послушал бы! Не, мы остаемся, Император не любит трусов. Если тебе так будет легче, считай, что это я тебя так обманул напоследок, по старой памяти. Такой уж я негодяй".

languages.text: "It's too bad I'm not a real Commissar who would comply! No. We're staying. The Emperor has no love for cowards. If it makes it easier for you, consider it just another one of my lies, out of force of habit. That's me, a scoundrel to the end."
languages.original_text: "Жаль, что я не настоящий комиссар, иначе непременно тебя послушал бы! Не, мы остаемся, Император не любит трусов. Если тебе так будет легче, считай, что это я тебя так обманул напоследок, по старой памяти. Такой уж я негодяй".

traits.locale_text: "It's a shame I'm not a real Commissar who would comply! No. We're staying. The Emperor has no love for cowards. If it makes it easier for you, consider it just another one of my lies, a force of habit. That's me, a scoundrel to the end."

"It's a shame I'm not a real Commissar who would comply! No. We're staying. The Emperor has no love for cowards. If it makes it easier for you, consider it just another one of my lies, a force of habit. That's me, a scoundrel to the end."

"It's too bad I'm not a real Commissar who would comply! No. We're staying. The Emperor has no love for cowards. If it makes it easier for you, consider it just another one of my lies, out of force of habit. That's me, a scoundrel to the end."

"It's too bad I'm not a real Commissar who would comply! No. We're staying. The Emperor has no love for cowards. If it makes it easier for you, consider it just another one of my lies, out of force of habit. That's me, a scoundrel to the end."

"It's too bad I'm not a real Commissar who would comply! No. We're staying. The Emperor has no love for cowards. If it makes it easier for you, consider it just another one of my lies, out of force of habit. That's me, a scoundrel to the end."

languages.text: “真遗憾，我可不是真正的政委，我恐怕不会遵守你的命令！不，我们要留在这里，帝皇可不喜欢胆小鬼。或者说，如果这么想能让你舒服些的话，你可以把这当成我的另一个谎言。我就是个满口谎言的人，到死都是个混蛋，这就是我。”
languages.original_text: "It's too bad I'm not a real Commissar who would comply! No. We're staying. The Emperor has no love for cowards. If it makes it easier for you, consider it just another one of my lies, out of force of habit. That's me, a scoundrel to the end."

traits.locale_text: “真遗憾，我可不是真正的政委，我恐怕不会遵守你的命令！不，我们要留在这里，帝皇可不喜欢胆小鬼。或者说，如果这么想能让你舒服些的话，你可以把这当成我的另一个谎言。我就是个满口谎言的人，到死都是个混蛋，这就是我。”

languages.text: 「人の言うことを聞くような本物のコミッサーではなくて残念ですね！いいえ、我々は残ります。皇帝が見守るなかでそのような臆病は認められません。少しでも気が楽になるなら、また私が嘘をついたと思っていただいて結構です。死ぬ間際まで悪党として生きます」
languages.original_text: "It's too bad I'm not a real Commissar who would comply! No. We're staying. The Emperor has no love for cowards. If it makes it easier for you, consider it just another one of my lies, out of force of habit. That's me, a scoundrel to the end."

traits.locale_text: 「人の言うことを聞くような本物のコミッサーではなくて残念ですね！いいえ、我々は残ります。皇帝が見守るなかでそのような臆病は認められません。少しでも気が楽になるなら、また私が嘘をついたと思っていただいて結構です。死ぬ間際まで悪党として生きます」

languages.text: «Lástima. Si fuera un Comisario de verdad, ¡acataría esa orden! Pero no. Nos quedamos. El Emperador no tiene ningún aprecio por los cobardes. Si le hace sentirse mejor, piense que esto solo es una más de las mentiras acostumbradas. Así soy yo, un rufián hasta la médula».
languages.original_text: "It's too bad I'm not a real Commissar who would comply! No. We're staying. The Emperor has no love for cowards. If it makes it easier for you, consider it just another one of my lies, out of force of habit. That's me, a scoundrel to the end."

traits.locale_text: «Lástima. Si fuera un Comisario de verdad, ¡acataría esa orden! Pero no. Nos quedamos. El Emperador no tiene ningún aprecio por los cobardes. Si le hace sentirse mejor, piense que esto solo es una más de las mentiras acostumbradas. Así soy yo, un rufián hasta la médula».

languages.original_text: "It's too bad I'm not a real Commissar who would comply! No. We're staying. The Emperor has no love for cowards. If it makes it easier for you, consider it just another one of my lies, out of force of habit. That's me, a scoundrel to the end."

languages.text: « Dommage que je sois pas un vrai commissaire formaté pour obéir aux ordres ! Non, on va rester. L'Empereur n'a que faire des lâches. Si ça peut vous aider, vous n'avez qu'à considérer que ce n'est qu'un mensonge de plus. C'est tout moi, ça. Ordure un jour, ordure pour toujours. »
languages.original_text: "It's too bad I'm not a real Commissar who would comply! No. We're staying. The Emperor has no love for cowards. If it makes it easier for you, consider it just another one of my lies, out of force of habit. That's me, a scoundrel to the end."

traits.locale_text: « Dommage que je sois pas un vrai commissaire formaté pour obéir aux ordres ! Non, on va rester. L'Empereur n'a que faire des lâches. Si ça peut vous aider, vous n'avez qu'à considérer que ce n'est qu'un mensonge de plus. C'est tout moi, ça. Ordure un jour, ordure pour toujours. »

languages.text: "Leider bin ich kein echter Kommissar, der gehorchen würde! Nein. Wir bleiben. Der Imperator mag keine Feiglinge. Wenn es Euch die Sache erleichtert, betrachtet es als eine weitere meiner gewohnheitsmäßigen Lügen. So bin ich eben, ein Schurke bis zum Schluss."
languages.original_text: "It's too bad I'm not a real Commissar who would comply! No. We're staying. The Emperor has no love for cowards. If it makes it easier for you, consider it just another one of my lies, out of force of habit. That's me, a scoundrel to the end."

traits.locale_text: "Leider bin ich kein echter Kommissar, der gehorchen würde! Nein. Wir bleiben. Der Imperator mag keine Feiglinge. Wenn es Euch die Sache erleichtert, betrachtet es als eine weitere meiner gewohnheitsmäßigen Lügen. So bin ich eben, ein Schurke bis zum Schluss."

languages.text: "Emrinize itaat edecek gerçek bir Komiser olmamam çok yazık! Hayır. Burada kalacağız. İmparator, korkakları sevmez. İçiniz rahat edecekse bunu da yalanlarımdan biri olarak düşünün. Alışkanlık işte, elden ne gelir? Mezarı boylayana dek alçağın teki olacağım, ben de böyle bir insanım!"
languages.original_text: "It's too bad I'm not a real Commissar who would comply! No. We're staying. The Emperor has no love for cowards. If it makes it easier for you, consider it just another one of my lies, out of force of habit. That's me, a scoundrel to the end."

traits.locale_text: "Emrinize itaat edecek gerçek bir Komiser olmamam çok yazık! Hayır. Burada kalacağız. İmparator, korkakları sevmez. İçiniz rahat edecekse bunu da yalanlarımdan biri olarak düşünün. Alışkanlık işte, elden ne gelir? Mezarı boylayana dek alçağın teki olacağım, gerçek yüzüm bu işte!"
